Articles.Content: Hi! I've been playing for a while now (If you consider landing on the Mun twice progress), and I already love this game. This isn't my first post on this forum (blah blah blah unstable rockets and proudest moments blah blah blah). One more thing, I am not a (OMG HOW) lefty.
Hello notanactuallefty39, and welcome to the forum.

Heya!

And sure the first Mun landing is progress.

OMG

I read the whole post and didn't understand the "lefty" thing, and then I read your username and BAM

*AH
